document_data.name: Drake's Tooth
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Drake's Tooth''''' was a [[Cormyrean]] privateering ship in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Etymology: The ''Drake's Tooth'' followed the standard naming customs of independant Cormyrean sailing ships, being named for a weapon belonging to one of Cormyr's rulers. In its case, the ship was named for [[Shiningbite]], the sword of Queen [[Gantharla Obarskyr]].
document_data.Activities: Like other independant Cormyrean ships, this vessel was used in the nation's ongoing efforts to combat pirates.
document_data.History: The ''Drake's Tooth'' operated in the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]] around [[1370 DR]].
